description:
Company Description

Digital Transformation Leaders is dedicated to helping business executives and leaders achieve digital maturity, innovation, and growth for their businesses. Our team has extensive experience in driving digital transformation across multiple industries internationally and building sustainable strategies that enable our clients to compete effectively in an ever-changing business landscape.

Role Description

This is a full-time hybrid role for a Director of Business Development located in Houston, and Austin TX with flexibility for some remote work. The Director of Business Development will be responsible for identifying and developing new business opportunities, planning and executing business growth strategies, generating leads, negotiating contracts, and managing key accounts.

Position Overview:

We are seeking an accomplished and visionary Director of Business Development to lead our expansion efforts for Houston, Austin, Texas, and nationwide engagement. The ideal candidate will be a strategic thinker and dynamic leader with a proven track record of establishing and nurturing strong business relationships, driving revenue growth, and managing portfolios effectively.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute strategic business development plans to achieve sales targets and expand our client base across Houston, AustinTexas, and nationwide.
• Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers, influencers, and stakeholders in target industries.
• Identify and capitalize on business opportunities by understanding client needs, proposing tailored digital transformation solutions, and closing deals.
• Collaborate closely with the marketing team to develop effective, innovative marketing strategies and campaigns to generate leads and drive brand awareness.
• Lead the end-to-end sales process, from prospecting and qualifying leads to negotiating contracts and ensuring successful project delivery.
• Drive continuous improvement by staying abreast of industry trends, market developments, and emerging technologies.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Provide regular reporting and updates on sales activities, pipeline status, and revenue forecasts to senior management.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field; MBA preferred.
• Proven track record of success in business development, sales, or account management, preferably in the technology or consulting industry.
• Strong business acumen with the ability to understand complex client requirements and develop innovative solutions to address them.
• Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills with the ability to influence and build rapport at all levels of an organization.
• Demonstrated experience in portfolio management, including identifying growth opportunities, managing client expectations, and delivering exceptional customer service.
• Highly organized with strong project management skills and the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment.
• Entrepreneurial mindset with a proactive and results-driven approach to achieving goals.
• Minimum 5 years experience in sales
• Active network and presence in the Houston, and/or Austin Texas, business communities with the flexibility for nationwide travel as needed.

Join us at Digital Transformation Leaders and lead our dynamic team in driving innovation and shaping the future of business. If you are a strategic business leader looking for a rewarding opportunity to make a significant impact, we want to hear from you!

To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter outlining your relevant experience and achievements to sales@digitaltransformationleaders.com
